overview: The Bible comes alive for children and the whole family! In Horseplay, Leah is out on Macky's horse without permission and easily outrides a spoiled Roman boy, who then challenges her to a horse race so he can salvage his damaged pride. The Bible stories of Joseph and his brothers and Philip and Simon the Sorcerer help kids learn how important it is to show forgiveness and have true values.
title: Friends and Heroes - Horseplay
